list.name: Superfood Tomato Soup
list.desc: Amazing soup filled with healthy superfoods that is sure to make any food connoisseur jump for joy.
ingredients: 1 tbsp. Cheddar Monterey Jack shredded cheese mix
preparation: Cook the steaks and prepare it by cutting them into pieces.
Cook the Tuna&Veggie patty and prepare it by cutting it into pieces.
Cook carrots and raisins together with olive oil on the stove.
Cook the tomato basil soup in a bowl either by microwave or on the stove (according to package instructions).
After getting to a good temperature, throw in the onions, cilantro, pieces of tuna&veggie patty, and pieces of steak.
Put in the carrots and raisins.
Sprinkle chipotle black pepper spice and put in chipotle tobasco sauce.
Enjoy the masterpiece!

list.name: Hearty Fiesta Sandwich
list.desc: Oriental dish of legends with a varied history. It's like a party in your mouth!
preparation: Cut the sandwich bread in half.
Microwave the chicken patty for 1.25 minutes.
Cut the chicken patty into pieces.
Cook and prepare the ground beef.
Put the ground beef on one half of the bread and the chicken pieces on the other half.
Put the fruity pebbles and blueberries in the sandwich.
Put the chipotle sauce on.
Glue it together with the cream cheese.
Bon apetit!

list.name: Crunchy Blueberry Yakisoba
list.desc: A wild card of a dish that defies tradition in order to go for a fresh, new taste.
preparation: Put olive oil into a pan and cook both eggs in there.
After cooking, put them into a bowl to use as a base.
Cook Yakisoba according to the packaging instructions. Put it in the bowl on top of the eggs.
Put granola and blueberries on top.
Put garlic and curry sauce on the dish.
